data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
MS released code to programatically interface with the routing and
    relay access lists of an Exchange 2000 server. This module would
    make use of the added functionality, and expose a clean interface to
    perl. If Exchange 5.5 exposes a similar interface, or one can hacked
    together, the code will be added to this module to create the same
    interface for Exchange 5.5.

    Thanks, Steven
